items.name: Gorgon's Gaze
enchantMods: Void Sphere has 18% increased Pulse Frequency
explicitMods: 5% additional Physical Damage Reduction while moving
5% reduced Elemental Damage taken while stationary
flavourText: Men always fell for her honeyed eyes,
and broke when they hit the ground.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill with a duration.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 74% increased Skill Effect Duration
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Gain a buff that makes you faster, harder to detect, and grants Phasing, letting you pass through enemies. Performing any skill replaces this buff with one that boosts melee physical damage of skills you use yourself (it will not apply to your melee skills used by totems). Consumes Frenzy Charges to increase duration.
explicitMods: 100% increased Skill Duration per Frenzy Charge removed
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Dawnbreaker
implicitMods: 8% of Physical Damage from Hits taken as Lightning Damage
explicitMods: -1% Chance to Block Attack Damage for every 200 Fire Damage taken from Hits Recently
19% of Cold Damage taken as Fire Damage

20% of Physical Damage taken as Fire Damage
Scorch Enemies in Close Range when you Block
flavourText: "The newcomers warn of doom and death beyond mortal ken.
I ask, why should we fear the fire when we serve the Lord of Light?"

socketedItems.secDescrText: Each supported spell skill will track damage you take, and be triggered when the total damage taken reaches a threshold. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps, or mines. Vaal skills, channelling skills, and skills with a reservation cannot be triggered.
explicitMods: This Gem can only Support Skill Gems requiring Level 64 or lower
You cannot Cast Supported Triggerable Spells directly
Trigger Supported Spells when you take 1980 total Damage from Hits
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Take less Physical and Elemental Damage for a short time. Consumes up to 5 Endurance Charges to lengthen the buff and further lessen Physical Damage taken. Shares a cooldown with other Guard skills.
explicitMods: 20% increased Buff Duration per Endurance Charge removed
This Skill's Cooldown does not recover during its effect
15.0% less Physical Damage taken per Endurance Charge removed

socketedItems.secDescrText: Creates a Void Sphere which Hinders enemies in an area around it, with the debuff being stronger on enemies closer to the sphere. It also regularly releases pulses of area damage. The Void Sphere will consume the corpses of any enemies which die in its area. Can only have one Void Sphere at a time.
explicitMods: Void Sphere has 10% increased Pulse Frequency
40% of Physical Damage Converted to Chaos Damage
Enemies in range are Hindered, with up to 39% reduced Movement Speed, based on distance from the Void Sphere

socketedItems.secDescrText: Applies a buff that protects the lower half of your life, preventing some of the immediate life loss when damaged by hits and applying the loss over time instead. Your life cannot be raised above low life other than by flasks, and while above low life, skills will cost life as well as mana.
explicitMods:
Life Recovery other than Flasks cannot Recover Life to above Low Life
When taking Damage from Hits, 45% of Life loss below half Life is Prevented, then 141% of Life loss prevented this way is lost over 4 seconds
Skills gain a Base Life Cost equal to 40% of Base Mana Cost while not on Low Life
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Defiance of Destiny
explicitMods: Gain 26% of Missing Unreserved Life before being Hit by an Enemy

Astonished, the raiding warlord ordered the man's family spared.
